name: sweagle
description: Manage, Validate and Secure your configuration data with Service Now Sweagle
author: Service Now

inputs.name: operation
inputs.label: Operation

options.info: Check connection and get info from your tenant
options.upload: Upload a file to your tenant
options.validate: Validate your configuration with specified validator
options.validationStatus: Get validation status for your configuration

inputs.helpMarkDown: Sweagle operation you want to realize (default is info to check connection to your tenant).

inputs.name: tenant
inputs.label: Tenant
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sweagle host you plan to connect to.

inputs.name: port
inputs.label: Sweagle port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sweagle port of the host you plan to connect to (default is 443 for HTTPS).

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sweagle token used to connect to your tenant with sufficient privileges.

inputs.name: proxyHost
inputs.label: Proxy Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: Proxy host example.proxy.com.

inputs.name: proxyPort
inputs.label: Proxy Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Proxy port in the format 1533.

inputs.name: proxyUser
inputs.label: Proxy User
inputs.helpMarkDown: User account used to connect to proxy.

inputs.name: proxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: User password used to connect to proxy.

inputs.name: cds
inputs.label: Configuration Data Set (CDS)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sweagle configuration data set on which you will perform your operation.

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: Input File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the input file to upload to Sweagle.

inputs.name: nodePath
inputs.label: Node Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The comma-separated path of the node to upload the data.

inputs.name: format
inputs.label: Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format of the configuration data file.

inputs.name: exporter
inputs.label: Exporter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exporter used to export your configuration.

inputs.name: validator
inputs.label: Validator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validator used to check your configuration.

inputs.name: arg
inputs.label: Parser Custom Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Parser custom arguments in object notation (JSON, XML or YAML) or comma separated list.

inputs.name: allowDelete
inputs.label: Allow Delete
inputs.helpMarkDown: To allow the deletion of existing data or not.

inputs.name: autoRecognize
inputs.label: Auto Recognize
inputs.helpMarkDown: To run the machine learning type recognition after the upload.

inputs.name: autoApprove
inputs.label: Auto Approve
inputs.helpMarkDown: To auto-approve the changeset or not.

inputs.name: cdsArgs
inputs.label: Parser extra CDS (comma separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional configuration data sets (CDS) used in parser, CDS names comma separated.

inputs.name: cdsTags
inputs.label: Parser tags for extra CDS (comma separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags of the additional configuration data sets (CDS) used in parser, comma separated.

inputs.name: changeset
inputs.label: Changeset Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Open changeset Id to add these changes to.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description to add

inputs.name: encoding
inputs.label: Encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown: The encoding of the upload data. Default UTF-8

inputs.name: forIncoming
inputs.label: For Incoming
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use validation for pending data or for last snapshot data (default).

inputs.name: identifierWords
inputs.label: Identifier Words
inputs.helpMarkDown: This parameter can be used for XML, JSON, or YAML files to uniquely identify a data item in a list or an array. Uniqueness allows listed data to be exported properly.

inputs.name: onlyParent
inputs.label: Only Parent
inputs.helpMarkDown: To restrict allow delete to only parent node.

inputs.name: storeSnapshotResults
inputs.label: Store Snapshot Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: To store a new snapshot or not.

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sweagle snapshot (release) tag, string without space.
inputs.visibleRule: operation = upload || operation = snapshot || operation = export

inputs.name: validationLevel
inputs.label: Snapshot Validation Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validation level to snapshot configuration.

inputs.name: withCustomValidations
inputs.label: With Custom Validations
inputs.helpMarkDown: To get the custom validations in the response.
